name: BURNING TENSHI
description:
ゲームは無料ですので、ドネーションはスキップできます。
The game is free-to-play but any donations are very appreciated to keep me creating more content!

You can skip the levels in the pause menu if the levels are too hard
むずかしすぎたらステージをスキップすることもできます。

I have a discord server, let's talk about hololive! I will post game development too
ディスコードサーバーを作りました。 ホロライブの話をしよう！

BURNING TENSHI is a fanmade hololive puzzle game created under a week by z-sylver for KanataContest 20/3/21. 

It looks like a fight broke out in the Hololive House and Kanata ended up on fire! She is desperate to put it out and it is up to you to guide her way through the puzzles to reach the pond to extinguish the flames. There seems to be an interesting ending to this game as well, do stick around!

Credits:

Inspiration: Pokemon Sliding Puzzle

Programming & Art: z-sylver

Music: 

This non-commerical fan game is a derivative work of Cover Corp's Hololive property. This game is made under Cover Corp's Derivative Work License Agreement and is neither endorsed or affiliated with Cover Corp. z-sylver does not claim any ownership of the Hololive property.

All videos were taken from and are owned by the official Hololive and hololive member channels.

If you enjoyed this game please consider supporting the Hololive Vtubers by subscribing to them!
